articles.description: Here are three mantras that can help parents reflect before acting and demonstrate to your children how to not be so reactive in stressful situations.
articles.content:
You're never going to be the perfect parent. And trying to be is setting yourself up for a lot of disappointment.
You can, however, be the parent your child needs, says Aliza Pressman, a development… [+2790 chars]
